reviewText: I am a 7th grade teacher and found it very useful this during my WWII Unit.  The video contains 4 short videos (25mins about each) broken down into 3-6 minute themes.  Anyone who teaches middle school kids can tell you--they have short attention spans.  You can show just want you want  the kids to focus on, pause, and talk about each section.  It's not the most exciting documentary, but it's "kid safe."  Obviously made for classroom use.
